data.lyric:
[ti:Spicy(feat. Post Malone) (Explicit)]
[ar:Ty Dolla $ign/Post Malone]
[al:Spicy (feat. Post Malone) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Spicy (feat. Post Malone) (Explicit) - Ty Dolla $ign/Post Malone
[00:02.04]Lyrics by：Austin Post/Glenda Proby/James Royo/Nye Lee Jr/Tyrone Griffin/Jr./Westen Weiss
[00:04.08]D**n James
[00:08.94]Dolla $ign Dolla $ign
[00:09.56]Ty Dolla $ign：
[00:09.98]Who tryna who tryna go
[00:11.72]Who gon' drop it down like there's money on the floor
[00:13.91]Who tryna who tryna bust it for the dollars
[00:16.41]Who tryna freak bring their homegirl and run it
[00:18.74]She my spicy lil' mama she let me bust her piñata
[00:23.28]I buy her all the designer but she's still leavin' tomorrow
[00:27.91]Ty Dolla $ign：
[00:28.95]Who tryna who tryna go
[00:32.12]Who n***a hope that she don't
[00:34.30]Who tryna slide for the night
[00:36.88]Who tryna wife her Not I
[00:39.29]Know my name say my name
[00:41.14]Yellow diamonds on my chain lemonade
[00:43.48]I can never be your main but tell your man
[00:45.95]You gon' have to call him back another time
[00:48.29]Girl let's get out and vibe
[00:51.19]Go up get loud
[00:53.66]Get right here and now
[00:56.98]Yeah tell me
[00:57.69]Ty Dolla $ign：
[00:58.21]Who tryna who tryna go
[00:59.67]Who gon' drop it down like there's money on the floor
[01:02.03]Who tryna who tryna bust it for the dollars
[01:04.46]Who tryna freak bring their homegirl and run it
[01:06.79]She my spicy lil' mama she let me bust her piñata
[01:11.18]I buy her all the designer but she's still leavin' tomorrow
[01:15.95]Post Malone：
[01:17.28]She tryna pull my pants down
[01:19.15]I was lightin' up a stoge on my break time
[01:21.50]Told her "Babe I got a meetin' over FaceTime"
[01:23.79]She don't care my lil' mama never waste time Ooh
[01:27.39]Gotta catch a flight real quick
[01:29.05]Took a Xanny on the plane and the f**kin' lipstick
[01:31.58]She look at me and laugh give a f**k what I think
[01:33.81]And she bad she a crazy but I like her like this yeah
[01:36.18]Shawty so bad man shawty so cold
[01:38.71]Wanna go out twenty-five years old
[01:41.10]Met her in the club they were playin' "Psycho"
[01:43.34]Now we match APs and they all rose-gold
[01:48.75]And we both can agree
[01:53.48]Ooh she wilder than me
[01:55.06]Ty Dolla $ign：
[01:55.64]Yeah tell me who tryna who tryna go
[01:56.91]Who gon' drop it down like there's money on the floor
[01:59.50]Who tryna who tryna bust it for the dollars
[02:01.94]Who tryna freak bring their homegirl and run it
[02:04.35]She my spicy lil' mama she let me bust her piñata
[02:08.81]I buy her all the designer but she's still leavin' tomorrow
data.trans:
[ti:Spicy(feat. Post Malone) (Explicit)]
[ar:Ty Dolla $ign/Post Malone]
[al:Spicy (feat. Post Malone) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.04]//
[00:04.08]damn james!制作
[00:08.94]//
[00:09.56]//
[00:09.98]谁想付诸行动
[00:11.72]谁会慢慢蹲下去 就好像地上有钱
[00:13.91]谁想为钞票而表演一下
[00:16.41]谁想疯狂一回 带着她们的姐妹来一起嗨
[00:18.74]她是我的性感妖娆小美妞 她愿意和我亲亲热热
[00:23.28]我给她买各种名牌 但她明天还是要离开
[00:27.91]//
[00:28.95]谁想付诸行动
[00:32.12]哪个男人希望她不爱
[00:34.30]谁想要度过疯狂的一夜
[00:36.88]谁想要和她结婚 我不想
[00:39.29]知道我的名字 大声说出我的名字
[00:41.14]我的项链上挂着黄色钻石 就像柠檬
[00:43.48]我永远不能做你的正牌男友 但是告诉你的男人
[00:45.95]你有空再给他回电话
[00:48.29]姑娘 我们出去嗨一场吧
[00:51.19]嗨起来 躁起来
[00:53.66]享受现在 享受当下
[00:56.98]告诉我
[00:57.69]//
[00:58.21]谁想付诸行动
[00:59.67]谁会慢慢蹲下去 就好像地上有钱
[01:02.03]谁想为钞票而表演一下
[01:04.46]谁想疯狂一回 带着她们的姐妹来一起嗨
[01:06.79]她是我的性感妖娆小美妞 她愿意和我亲亲热热
[01:11.18]我给她买各种名牌 但她明天还是要离开
[01:15.95]//
[01:17.28]她想把我裤子脱下来
[01:19.15]我在休息时间抽烟
[01:21.50]我告诉她 宝贝 我有个视频会议
[01:23.79]她不在乎 我的小宝贝从来不会浪费时间
[01:27.39]得赶紧去搭飞机
[01:29.05]在飞机上吃了点那种东西 涂着口红
[01:31.58]她看着我笑 不在乎我想什么
[01:33.81]她很坏 她很疯狂 但我喜欢她这样
[01:36.18]姑娘太坏啦 朋友 姑娘好冷酷
[01:38.71]想要出去约会 二十五岁
[01:41.10]在夜店和她相遇 他们在玩游戏
[01:43.34]现在我们戴着情侣款爱彼手表 都是玫瑰金色的
[01:48.75]我们都同意
[01:53.48]她比我更狂野
[01:55.06]//
[01:55.64]告诉我 谁想行动起来
[01:56.91]谁会慢慢蹲下去 就好像地上有钱
[01:59.50]谁想为钞票而表演一下
[02:01.94]谁想疯狂一回 带着她们的姐妹来一起嗨
[02:04.35]她是我的性感妖娆小美妞 她愿意和我亲亲热热
[02:08.81]我给她买各种名牌 但她明天还是要离开
